question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: IsProposalAbstained()] [Abstention Count] At Association_Helper.cs line 43-44, does abstention count include non-members who abstained before removal? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: IsProposalAbstained()] [Threshold Logic] Should MaximalAbstentionThreshold block proposal if exceeded, or should it be MinimalAbstentionThreshold for consistency? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: CheckEnoughVoteAndApprovals()] [Approval Count Race] At Association_Helper.cs line 49, if approvals are filtered by current membership, can approved count drop below threshold after approval but before release? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: CheckEnoughVoteAndApprovals()] [Vote Threshold Calculation] At Association_Helper.cs line 56, does Concat count same address multiple times if they appear in multiple vote lists? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: CheckEnoughVoteAndApprovals()] [MinimalVoteThreshold] Can MinimalVoteThreshold be 0, allowing proposals to pass without any votes? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: CheckEnoughVoteAndApprovals()] [Early Return Logic] At Association_Helper.cs line 52-53, if isApprovalEnough is false, are other checks skipped, or should all conditions be evaluated? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: AssertProposalNotYetVotedBySender()] [Triple Check Logic] At Association_Helper.cs line 134-135, does OR condition properly prevent voting in any category, or can same-block multi-votes bypass via state update timing? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: AssertProposalNotYetVotedBySender()] [Contains Check] Do Contains checks use reference equality allowing address spoofing, or value equality preventing duplicates? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: GenerateProposalId()] [Token Null Handling] At Association_Helper.cs line 142, if input.Token is null, does HashHelper.ComputeFrom(input) create deterministic hash allowing collision attacks? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: GenerateProposalId()] [Context.GenerateId] Does Context.GenerateId include sufficient entropy to prevent proposal ID prediction by attackers? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: GenerateProposalId()] [Same Input Collision] Can two proposals with identical CreateProposalInput but different submission times generate same proposalId? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: CreateNewProposal()] [Proposer Override] At Association_Helper.cs line 157, does setting Proposer = Context.Sender override input proposer in CreateProposalBySystemContract scenario? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: CreateNewProposal()] [Null Proposal Check] At Association_Helper.cs line 163, does null check prevent overwriting if proposalId collision occurs with different proposal? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: CreateNewProposal()] [State Consistency] Between Validate check at line 162 and State.Proposals assignment at line 164, can proposal become invalid via organization changes? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: CheckCreateProposalInput()] [Title Length] At Association_Helper.cs line 178, can title.Length be exactly MaxLengthForTitle (255) without '>' triggering off-by-one? (Low)
